TopicTitle: What purpose could this part serve?

Articles.Content: made it forever ago. never did anything with it, I have probably 100 parts like this that I haven't had time to do the work to put into the game. just kind of model then move on to the next.
Fuel tanks, life support , KAS containers. I think they would make cool fuel tanks

well i guess these are sort of complimentary, I guess I need several more for a parts pack.

the one on the right is actually supposed to be used for flotation, and would double as an intake. the second one on the left is meant to be inflated (although I don't do animations).

Edited September 10, 2014 by trekkie_
I vaguely recall the Snacks mod wanting models for parts. Any of those could hold Snacks.

The one furthest to the left looks like it could be some type of pontoon. If it were slung under a platform or raft like this

It's a raft without the flat part on the top

I vaguely recall the Snacks mod wanting models for parts. Any of those could hold Snacks.

I second this idea, find an addon that needs parts and donate them
